value.title: Create and use custom visuals for Power BI in minutes!!
value.excerpt: Create and use custom visuals for Power BI in minutes!! If you are not able to use custom visuals from the AppStore but you still need them, you can now create your own and use them in Power BI, all of that in minutes!  In today's video, I am going to show you how you can use a custom visual we created

value.title: DAX Fridays! #11: Using variables in DAX
value.excerpt: Variables are an extremely useful feature in DAX, but perhaps not a well known one. Variables, 1. Make your formulas more readable 2. You can reuse them through your report 3. Can also be tables 4. Are more efficient  Download our Growth dashboard if you want to see the example live:http://curbal.com/blog/the-ultimate-dashboard-to-track-your-website-growth-with-google-analytics-and-power-bi-supercharged-excel
